name: SKYJACKER (old) (Canceled)
blurb: Space Battle Flight Simulator with the most incredibly dynamic gameplay ever seen!

rewards.reward: No Reward
This isn't a pledge - we just wanted to get your attention! Please look at the spreadsheet in Update #4 to clarify the rewards for each pledge level.

An exclusive desktop WALLPAPER (which is available only for THIS reward tier!) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device, along with our heartfelt thanks. We appreciate your contribution, no matter how small!

The GAME SOUNDTRACK (DRM-free digital version) + an exclusive desktop WALLPAPER for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device, along with our heartfelt thanks. We appreciate your contribution, no matter how much!

The GAME STANDARD EDITION (DRM-free digital downloadable version) in all of its unearthly beauty on PC or Mac + one totally cool, exclusive desktop WALLPAPER (different from previous reward tier) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device. Nothing extra, just the game itself! We respect your desire to play the finished game, and guarantee you will not be disappointed!

Get the AESTETIC BUNDLE, which includes SPECIAL EDITION of the game (DRM-free digital downloadable version) on PC or Mac, with movie intro, multiple video-cuts during the game, and other aesthetic in-game add-ons + one totally cool, exclusive desktop WALLPAPER (different from previous reward tier) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device.

Do you have a family member, like a brother who loves playing games, or just a significant other who you would like to have an extra copy of the game? Get the CO-OP BUNDLE, which includes double set of previous tier: 2 copies of the finished game (Standard edition, DRM-free digital downloadable version) for PC or Mac + exclusive desktop WALLPAPER.

The GAME SOUNDTRACK (DRM-free digital version) + previous reward tier + exclusive access to the Beta of the game, and access to the private discussion community. We believe this way we can satisfy your interest and include you in the game creation process.

Do you have a family member, like a brother who loves playing games, or just a significant other who you would like to have an extra copy of the game? Get the CO-OP AESTETIC BUNDLE, which includes 2 copies of the SPECIAL EDITION of the game (DRM-free digital downloadable version) on PC or Mac, with movie intro, multiple video-cuts during the game, and other aesthetic in-game add-ons + one totally cool, exclusive desktop WALLPAPER (different from previous reward tier) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device.

Don't like to play as a human? Would you rather go alien? Get the SPECIAL ANTIPIRATE EDITION, which includes: SPECIAL EDITION GAME(DRM-free digital downloadable version) + one totally cool, exclusive desktop ALIEN WALLPAPER (different from all previous rewards tier) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device. + ADDITIONAL SET OF MISSIONS (the number is a subject to change, but NOT LESS than 12-15 additional missions  overall), where you get to play against pirates, escorting convoys, defending your space base etc. Each race will have unique interface skin, several unique types of weaponry and other features, specific to the race and unavailable for pirates. Here you have a chance to find out how it feels to be attacked by pirates in space. This tier also includes an exclusive access to the Beta of the game, and access to the private discussion community.\r\nThis edition is EXCLUSIVE to the Kickstarter campaign backers and won't be available in the further official release of the game SKYJACKER.

What about to participate in battles over the planet surface? Get the SPECIAL PLANETARY CAMPAIGNS EDITION, which includes: GAME SPECIAL EDITION (DRM-free digital downloadable version) + one totally cool, exclusive desktop PLANETARY BATTLE WALLPAPER (different from all previous rewards tier) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device. + ADDITIONAL SET OF MISSIONS (the number is a subject to change, but NOT LESS than 12-15 additional missions in overall), where you play PIRATE, flying in planetary space and attacking planetary bases (located in volcano, in rocks, in asteroid craters, etc.). This prize also includes exclusive access to the Beta of the game, and access to the private discussion community.\r\nThis edition is EXCLUSIVE to the Kickstarter campaign backers and won't be available in the further official release of the game SKYJACKER.

ALL EXTRA MISSIONS COLLECTION BUNDLE includes:\r\nGAME SPECIAL EDITION (DRM-free digital downloadable version) +both WALLPAPERS from both $40 tiers + common set of additional missions from ANTIPIRATE EDITION and from PLANETARY CAMPAIGNS EDITION (the number is a subject to change, but NOT LESS than 25+ missions in overall). This prize also includes exclusive access to the Beta of the game, and access to the private discussion community. But this prize does NOT include the game soundtrack. Check upper tiers if you're willing to get soundtrack together with ALL EXTRA MISSIONS COLLECTION BUNDLE.\r\nThis edition is EXCLUSIVE to the Kickstarter campaign backers and won't be available in the further official release of the game SKYJACKER

It is clear to us that you want to know more about the game universe. We are glad to assist you with this desire. \r\nGet the ALL-DIGITAL REWARD BUNDLE containing previous reward tier + PDF version of the SKYJACKER Art Book (filled with 100+ full color pages of concept art - detailed illustrations of alien races, their planetary habitats and spacecrafts designs; You will also find art-content extras, which may not be included into the current version of the game, and much much more!)

Do you have a family member, like a brother who loves playing games, or just a significant other who you would like to have an extra copy of the game and other stuff? Get the CO-OP EDITION of the ALL-DIGITAL REWARD BUNDLE, which includes DOUBLE SET OF EACH ITEM for you both! : 2 copies of the finished game (DRM-free digital downloadable version) for PC or Mac +2 sets of both WALLPAPERS and 2 common sets of additional missions from from both $40 tiers (ANTIPIRATE EDITION and from PLANETARY CAMPAIGNS EDITION; the number is a subject to change, but NOT LESS than 25+ missions in overall). This prize also includes exclusive access to the Beta of the game, and access to the private discussion community for you both!\r\nWe are not greedy! Enjoy!

Do you like special gifts?\r\nGet the AWESOME SPECIAL BUNDLE containing a SPECIAL EDITION of the game (DRM-free digital downloadable version) on PC or Mac, with movie intro, multiple video-cuts during the game, and other aesthetic in-game add-ons + T-SHIRT level-1 designed exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign (check the art to the left), + a limited edition print of the game POSTER in full size (36" x 24") + special thanks in the game\u2019s credits, and previous reward tier. (These items are exclusive to the campaign and will be shipped for free in the US. Please add funds to your pledge for international shipping according to the price calculator at http://ircalc.usps.com/)

ALL EXTRA MISSIONS ADVANCED COLLECTION BUNDLE includes: SPECIAL EDITION of the game (DRM-free digital downloadable version) on PC or Mac, with movie intro, multiple video-cuts during the game, and other aesthetic in-game add-ons +both WALLPAPERS and common set of additional missions from the ANTIPIRATE EDITION and from the PLANETARY CAMPAIGNS EDITION (the number is a subject to change, but NOT LESS than 25+ missions  overall) + T-SHIRT with an emblem of your most favorite race of  your choice (including Balagores!), designed exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign (check examples of the art to the left - RACE EMBLEM T-Shirts) + a limited edition print of the game POSTER in full size (36" x 24") + special thanks in the form of game\u2019s credits + Digital soundtrack and PDF version of the SKYJACKER Art Book \r\n(These items are exclusive to the campaign and will be shipped for free in the US. Please add funds to your pledge for international shipping according to the price calculator at http://ircalc.usps.com/)

ALL EXTRA MISSIONS ADVANCED COLLECTION CO-OP BUNDLE includes: 2 copies of the SPECIAL EDITION of the game (DRM-free digital downloadable version) on PC or Mac, with movie intro, multiple video-cuts during the game, and other aesthetic in-game add-ons +both WALLPAPERS and common set of additional missions from ANTIPIRATE EDITION and from PLANETARY CAMPAIGNS EDITION (the number is a subject to change, but NOT LESS than 25+ missions  overall) + T-SHIRT level-1 + second T-SHIRT with emblems of your most favorite race of your choice (including Balagores!), designed exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign (check examples of the art to the left - RACE EMBLEM T-Shirts) + a limited edition print of the game POSTER in full size (36" x 24") + special thanks in the form of game\u2019s credits + Digital soundtrack and PDF version of the SKYJACKER Art Book \r\n(These items are exclusive to the campaign and will be shipped for free in the US. Please add funds to your pledge for international shipping according to the price calculator at http://ircalc.usps.com/)

Do you prefer to feel the gift in your own two hands? Get the DELUXE PHYSICAL BOX BUNDLE containing SPECIAL EDITION of the game DVD and the soundtrack CD + T-SHIRT level-2 (check the art to the left) + previous reward tier with the exception of the T-shirt level-1.\r\n(Please don't forget to add funds to your pledge for international shipping according to the price calculator at http://ircalc.usps.com/)

Heh, heh, we guessed that you are a different breed of backer! You are a collector that can recognize an intrinsic value! Get the Hardcover SKYJACKER Art Book similar to its digital version (PDF in the ALL-DIGITAL REWARD BUNDLE tier), signed by Eugene Zhukov and the rest of the team leads + T-SHIRT level-3 (check the art to the left) + previous reward tier with the exception of the both previous levels' T-shirts. (Please don't forget to add funds to your pledge for international shipping according to the price calculator at http://ircalc.usps.com/)

Are you here because you would like to leave a personal footprint? Get the AWESOME PERSONALIZED BUNDLE: We will create PERSONALIZED T-SHIRT "I'm a Backer of SKYJACKER" level-4 (check the art to the left) with YOU as a character there (head area only!), painted by the game's artist, + previous reward tier. Furthermore, you will get any 3 T-shirts of your choice from the previous reward tiers (level 1,2,3 or any of the race emblem) in addition to your exclusive personalized T-Shirt level-4! Don't worry about the shipping cost even if you are outside of US! You do so much for us and we appreciate your contribution. We are glad to offer you a FREE shipping internationally, as a token of our utmost appreciation.

It\u2019s not enough for you just to play the game? What do you think about a chance to be a part of the game? In the end of the story Ael-Skyjacker meets other humans, who are space pilots too! So we have an open position for such in-game characters - very limited proposal by the way!\r\nGet the EXCLUSIVE CUSTOM BUNDLE:\r\nWe'll create in 3D and animate YOU as a subject for an EXCLUSIVE CUSTOM PLAYER CHARACTER. This includes a 3D-model of YOU (including your face, body proportions, etc.) dressed in the original space suit; your personal logo will be located on your spacecraft; your name will be fixed in the list of space pirates inside the game; your character will have the highest category of criminal community rating. Only YOU can play this character (we'll give you a secret code to activate it). Other players can hire your character in their team missions, so they'll get to see it too! + you will get previous reward tier for sure + FREE shipping internationally, as a token of our utmost appreciation.

You prefer to play for high stakes? Everything or nothing? We-e-e-ll ... You are here because you possess a balance of unique qualities such as recognizing a hidden gem that with your help and wisdom blossoms into a treasure everyone else would like to possess\u2026 WE would like to have an opportunity to ask your permission and let us use your CUSTOM CHARACTER during our promo campaigns: posters, trailers, other official types of media (such as video trailers), etc.\r\nYou will also get the previous reward tier included. Furthermore you are invited to the lunch with our team leads when game will be finished. You must be able to travel to the Los Angeles, CA, USA. Please contact us directly in order to make personal arrangements before the end of the Kickstarter campaign.
